body_html: There are a bunch of things in PyTorch that can currently lead to initialization of a context on the first visible GPU; things like CPU-GPU copies and .tolist() all need to be inside with torch.cuda.device_of(tensor): blocks. None of this is a problem if you use torch.cuda.set_device but the devs typically recommend CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES instead.

body: There are a bunch of things in PyTorch that can currently lead to initialization of a context on the first visible GPU; things like CPU-GPU copies and `.tolist()` all need to be inside `with torch.cuda.device_of(tensor):` blocks. None of this is a problem if you use `torch.cuda.set_device` but the devs typically recommend CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES instead.
